ComicInfo.Title: Dead From Exposure; The Perfect Pearl; Under The Influence
ComicInfo.Summary:
IF EVERY TOMBSTONE TELLS A TALE . . . YOU'RE IN LUCK, BECAUSE THIS GRAVEYARD IS FULL OF THEM!
You know the drill, comic guys and gals . . . so let's VROOM, VROOM! Fueled by the vengeful spirit of the legendary EC Comics, we proudly present all-new tales of the macabre and merciless from some of the top talents with a penchant for dragging you down to the bottom stair of despair!
This month: Live hard, die fast creators J. Holtham and Ra l Allén, Amy Roy and Claire Roe, and Jay Stephens and David Lapham welcome you in the cold grasp of the ABYSS-there's no need to RSVP, and time shares are available!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-24 16:04:10. [CVDB1074017]
ComicInfo.Writer: Amy Roy, Jason Holtham, Jay Stephens
ComicInfo.Colorist: Brittany Peer, Inaki Azpiazu, Nick Filardi
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dustin Weaver, James Stokoe, Jay Stephens, Lee Bermejo, Rian Hughes
